attributes.action: Should my parents get power over my hair and wheather it should be cut or not?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My parents decide wheather my hair should be cut or not. I don't get any say in this. can somekind of letter be sent please to say that I should get to choose after all it is my hair.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
